amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 119-2 to delay the enactment of this bill until the Secretary of Health and Human Services and the Attorney General each certify that the bill will lead to a reduction in overdose deaths.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Trahan amendment (A002) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 182 - 226 (Roll no. 32).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment and the bill pursuant to the rule.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Trahan amendment (A002) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 182 - 226 (Roll no. 32).
